procurementMethodName.title: Procurement method name
procurementMethodName.description: The name of the method is more specific than `procurementMethod`. See README.md for guidance.

acceleratedProcedure.title: Accelerated procedure
acceleratedProcedure.description: Whether or not the delay for tenderers to bid is shorter than the usual legal delay.

acceleratedProcedureRationale.title: Accelerated procedure rationale
acceleratedProcedureRationale.description: The rationale for choosing to proceed with an accelerated procedure.

stagedProcedure.title: Staged procedure
stagedProcedure.description: The procedure will take place in successive stages. In each stage, some participants may be eliminated.

possiblyNoNegotiation.title: Possibly no negotiation
possiblyNoNegotiation.description: TThe procuring entity reserves the right to award the contract on the basis of the initial bids without any further negotiations.
